title: Ze Bad Nasties Hall ov Shame
name: Ze Bad Nasties Hall ov Shame
description:
A Map by Madamegonzaga

Shame Shame we know your name! Here let us gather toadgezzle ze &quot;Worst Of&quot; ze places wot suck. Not tou say zay ar beyond redemptionings, just zat zay are beyond mein pocketboook's support und hav earned ze aweird ov being poot on ze Bad Nasties Hall ov Shame map. Please tou add your &quot;fair warnings.&quot; No reason your fiends should suffer ze same bad nasties. Kak!

properties.name: Accosted by Ass at San Francisco Centre
properties.description: Posted by Wendolyne 865 Market Street, San Francisco CAAbercrombie and Fitch obviously eschews subliminal advertising in favor of the overt. Imagine my surprise when, having been distractedly waiting for the bus and counting to be sure I had all my packages, I looked across the street and suddenly came head-on with a different sort of package, this one belonging to an extremely large young man in tightie whiteys! There\'s an even more suggestive vision of a young man in his stinkies a bit further down at Market and Van Ness but my heart palpitations were such that I was unable to focus on photography. To get the full-on impact, you really must see these ads at night when they\'re backlit to reveal the soft young manflesh in all its glory. Pity an avid admirer was blocking my view. I believe the ad was for Abercrombie and Fitch, but it could have been for CK. And really, who cares? The army of brightly lit hard-bodied young men aren\'t really selling underwear, now are they? At any rate, I am simply glad to see that Bebe\'s campaign featuring sexy pouting anorexic five-year olds covered in sparkles seems to have ended.

properties.name: Cafe La Boheme
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga 3318 24th Street, San Francisco CAKak.

properties.name: DANGEROUS INTERSECTION!
properties.description: Posted by Wendolyne This is where I saw a clueless cell-phone-talking driver hit a man on a bike who had his child in a little rumble seat behind him! Thank goodness for the new cell phone driving law, perhaps there will be some relief for the luckless pedestrian. Both child and father were unhurt but an angry mob almost lynched the urban assault vehicle\'s driver.

properties.name: Dinner at the Rogue Brewery
properties.description: Posted by Jason 2320 osu drive, newport, orWe had a disappointing time here, it was a mix of a few bad details. *The stench of garbage from the dumpsters greeted us in the parking lot, and as we strolled along the nearby pier. *Emiko stumbled and scraped her knee on the pier. *Tabor had a big potty training accident all over the restaurant floor right as we arrived. *The fancy ravioli was terribly stale *We tried to buy some beer to go, to bring to the family gathering the following day, but the retail clerk had apparenlty just disappeared, so the kids had a few restless minutes to pull all kinds of rogue branded merchandise down off the shelves. but, overall, i\'d recommend the place, just order a burger or something basic. The actual really great part about the place is that you have to stroll right through the heart of the brewery itself to get to the restaurant, dodging forklifts and strolling through puddles of hte latest microbrew creations spilling from the steel vats.

properties.name: Getting it on at School
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000 Tampa, Fl(06-08) 20:01 PDT Tampa, Fla. (AP) -- Two middle school teachers resigned after students saw them having sex in a classroom, the school district said. Frances J. Sepulveda, 30, and Bryant J. Wilburn, 29, said they had sex in the classroom during school hours on "one or two occasions," according to an investigation by the Hillsborough County school district. They resigned last month after two students at Coleman Middle School reported they saw the teachers having sex. The classroom door was locked and a window was covered with paper, but a boy and a girl told school officials they could see inside. "These teachers showed appallingly bad judgment," school district spokesman Steve Hegarty said Wednesday. "We dealt with it quickly, and the teachers are no longer welcome in the Hillsborough County classroom." State officials will determine if the teachers will be allowed to work in other schools. Both teachers have unlisted phone numbers and could not be reached for comment Thursday. Wilburn told the St. Petersburg Times he was embarrassed by the incident.

properties.name: Lowe's: If you can't say anything nice...shop elsewhere!
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga 1340 El Camino Real, San Bruno, CA

properties.name: Lucky Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland  1111 21st St, Sacramento, CAThis used to be a pretty good spot , but the last coupld of times I have been there the service has been really terrible. like forty-five minutes just to take the order. I may check back in a while, but it is not among my first choices.

properties.name: Muzzled Dogs and Weak Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Jason  20th & Harrison, SF, CAHad a few minutes to kill before brunch, found a cafe with outdoor seating (the weather was absolutely stunning during the entire trip!) to get some morning coffee. There was a cute gentle occasionally barking dog that got muzzled my her owner during our tenure there, the dog could tell we had pity for her, so she stretched her leash over the sidewalk and lay in the sun close enough to our table that the kids could reach down and pet her. The coffee was amazingly disappointing, i think they don\'t do brewed coffee, so they made us 2 way-too-watery americanos. bummer. The place seemed cool, murals everywhere, and we walked in during a very energetic birthday song being performed by the entire staff (including apron donned cooks).

properties.name: Naughty Customers Expect to be Seated at Empty Tables!
properties.description: Posted by Wendolyne  399 Grove Street, San Francisco, CA, 94102We arrived between breakfast and lunch. The stoic host resolutely refused to allow us to be seated until each and every table was emptied from breakfast and set for lunch. He cared not a whit that I was feeling faint, nor did he shed a tear that the opera rehearsal would begin soon. He begrudgingly suggested waiting at the bar where the only possibly available seating was laden with coats of those perched on nearby stools. I guess I could have dealt with all o\'dat, but the last straw was when we were finally seated (much to the poor host\'s chagrin, I imagine) and the waitress asked if we\'d like bottled water or if tap water would be sufficient. I really hate how snooty restaurants present this choice by intimating that if you\'re a cheap bastard who doesn\'t care about your health, well then, by all means--go with the tap water. Sure, say I\'m being too harsh, but when kindly asked if we could just simply have a seat at a table and hold off on ordering until they were ready for lunch, the host maintained that we\'d simply have to wait. So we stood and waited like good citizens. Had I not had an opera engagement and been in need of nourishment beforehand, I\'d have marched out, but as it was with being rushed, feeling faint, and waiting for a friend I was caught like a rat in a trap. As it is, Citizen Cake is banished from my kingdom. I will admit to enjoying the marshmallow in my mocha, but no more than that. Fancy treats aren\'t worth putting up with rude hosts, and there are far too many delicacies beckoning from elsewhere for my attentions. Disclaimer: A delightful old comrade of mine once worked here and maybe still does. I know that *she* would never treat a chocolate-loving fellow citizen in this manner...so my apologies to those who don\'t harsh the mellow who may be Citizen Cake proles. Rosebud!

properties.name: Squat und Gobble
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga 1428 Haight Street, San Francisco CAKnot ass goode az vun ov ze OTHER vuns witch eez in ze Lower Haight...kak! Gobble Gobble. I hav bin angry ever since zay stopped agreeking tou mayketh mee ze "Yellow Bird" ov yore from ze menu. BAH! I donut nose aboot ze otters in ze chain, butt ze Lower Haight resturdant seems tou hav ze more consistent quality in ze foods und ze dreenkies zen ze upper Haight vun. Veddy soddy tou report, butt true. After ze last mocha I bought tasted ov ze poisons, I hav knot deigned ze re-entry. Kak Kak! Sometimes splendid, sometimes Kak Kak Kak! und I donut hav ze monies tou burn so I donut goose tou ze Upper Haight resturdant no mo. Mebbe zay poot ze Yellow Bird on ze menu again I wood try. AMIMBLE ZE YELLOWBIRD! (sign in photo from Fillmore site; same nicey subliminals in ze Haight sign, though!) (*)(*)

properties.name: T-Mobile Thwarts Electricity Bandits
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga 1457 Haight Street, San Francisco CA"WE NO LONGER CHARGE CELL PHONES FOR ANY CUSTOMER!" Despite the unfriendly sign screaming at me from the front door I went inside. I felt slighty sorry for interrupting ze ghoul who was surfing ze ebay site for deals, but I was in ze hurry und wanted to see ze fancy phone w/camera und datebook und email und all zat jazz so I finally said, "Exsqueeze mee, might aryoo assist me?" und shee looked up und said, "Wha?" so I repeated ze kvetchstion...they had no inventory ov ze latest phones, she said ze boss donut lyke to place orders. So I simply had to comment zat betwixxxt ze door sign scaring off anyone needing a quick phone juice and the hands-off inventory policy, I was lookin\' forweird tou seeing wot wot new store might open zare. Purrhaps Madame Gonzaga\'s Vampire Stakes Cafe eez not too far off in mein future! I mean, come ze hells on! Iffzat was mein store, I\'d have ze line ov pluggies availabull wif ze universal chargers. Good customer service eez ze best advertissement! Hells bells, why not poot up ze sign sayink, "All Rabble Invited to Recharge Cell Phones." Dumb bunnies.

properties.name: The Food at PDX Airport is Exceptionally Bad
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  7000 Northeast Airport Way, Portland, OR, 97218I\'ve eaten at the Windemer Pub (very disgusting) and at the Good Dog Bad Dog restaurant (predictably bad).

properties.name: Toadbacco cherries und rude smokingers.
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga 3158 Mission Street, San Francisco CAGah! Ze smokingers on ze patio keeped flick-flicking ze ciggies on ze flo\' where people were sitttttting und I had ta get up TWICE tou grind out ze hot ashes so I donut sit on zem. Iffin I were ze rude dog I\'da grinded \'em outtie on ze tender fleshy bits ov ze offenders. Ban ze toadbaccco from all venues or at least provide ze ashtrays fur ze nasty toadbacco smokingers. Sniffing zat cancer air eez bad enough; having ze fire-ass to boot eez bullshit!

properties.name: Union Square Retail Angels with War on ze Shoulders
properties.description: Posted by MadamegonzagaPowell and Post Street, San Francisco CAHee! Today in Union Square I was taking pictures of ze Victoria\'s Secrets angels in ze shoppe window because the reflection of the statue in the middle of the square in the window seemingly perched on ze tawdry cheap angel mannequin was too juicy to deny. A chickie-doodle walked by and tiredly proclaimed to her companions: "I see that all the time, people photographing our lingerie windows when I\'m at work." I nodded towards Union Square\'s Dewey Monument, which commemorates Admiral Dewey\'s victory at Manilla during the Spanish-American war of 1898 und veddy earnestly said unto them "I\'m advocating to replace that terrible statue with one of your beautiful sexy shopping angels!" They gave me ze stink-eye and walked on; afraid or purrhaps merely cornfuzzled. It was hilarious to me yet unfortunate zat I had no one to share my zany madness with at ze time.

properties.name: Young stud flicks butts.
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga 558 Castro Street, San Francisco CAI allmoist had ze apop!pop!pop!lectic seizure ze otter day as I was was hanging out waitin\' tou be seated fur ze brunchings und some young dude und heez ghoulish fiend, smokings ciggies, zay throw down ze lit ciggies on ze sidewalk und zen just stand zare...ashcan und garbage can mere yards away! I kakked at zem: "Doggies walk by here! You burn paws! Garbage can right zare!!!!" Und zay PRETENDEDEDED NOT TO HEAR ME. Zen ze guy, hee ever so slowly puts heez fooot out und covers butt. I kept snarking toweirds zem atill wee were all seated. WOT WOT ZE FUXXXX EEZ WRONG WIF PEOPLESEESESES??? I shoulda kik-kikked heez asssss cabbage und herr\'s tou! Good breeeding und proper humanistic actions wood dictate zat wen aryoooo smokey out-of-doors, aryooo poot ze ciggie out ENTIRELY und zen dispose ovvit in ze garbage. Carry it with aryooo iffin aryooo hav toooo! Donut leave burning ash und filters in your wake. Bastids!!!!! Donkey veddy mulch.

properties.name: bloodsuckin' dominos pizza!  07/09, 8:15pm
properties.description: Posted by Kipod2593 8th ave, 10030ordered a pizza at 7:08. delivery guy called an confirmed address (!) at 7:29, said he was 3 min away and could i wait OUTSIDE for him. i do (!?!), for over 10 min and he doesn\'t come. i call him. no answer. i call the store. they ask me to wait 2 more min. i do (!??!?!). i call back. i tell them i\'m not paying and they say "we\'re not giving you a pizza for free" (WTF!?! it\'s BEEN over 30 min by HER admission!). i go back upstairs at 7:50. delivery guy calls me back saying he went to the cross streets and there was no such street number--and he tells me THE WRONG cross streets (after he confirmed!). i tell him i\'m not going outside again, he\'s coming to me. he agrees. and never shows up. i write a nasty email to customer service and call and cancel the order--and the woman says "ok" like THAT\'s the solution to the problem! I\'M HUNGRY!!! when i rule the world, they will ALL pay...

properties.name: the city gives out tickets on a stinkie street they never clean
properties.description: Posted by Ludmillahow could i tell it was a hydrant - i thought it was a bush. it doesn\'t work, all its fitting are broken off and there is a bush growing out of it. people sleep in their cars and motor homes on this block and stay there for weeks at a time. i found a poor dead smelly dog under a pile of cardboard right on this corner. there is so much poop and trash and broken glass on this block that i wonder how the city can dare fine me 00 for having parked here.
